### Continuous results
``` {r echo = F, results = 'asis'} 
for(i in continuous){
  lab = dict2[dict2$variable == i,]$variable_label
  if(is_empty(lab)){
    print(print.cont(get({{i}})) %>% 
            kbl(caption = i) %>% 
            kable_styling())} else {
              print(print.cont(get({{i}})) %>% 
                      kbl(caption = lab) %>% 
                      kable_styling())
            }
  
  
}
```
